â€‚â€‚â€‚â€‚MyBatisæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ”¯æŒæ™®é€šSQLæŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œå­˜å‚¨è¿‡ç¨‹å’Œé«˜çº§æ˜ å°„çš„ä¼˜ç§€æŒä¹…å±‚æ¡†æ¶ã€‚
â€‚â€‚â€‚â€‚é¡µé¢å‘é€è¯·æ±‚ç»™æ§åˆ¶å™¨ï¼Œæ§åˆ¶å™¨è°ƒç”¨ä¸šåŠ¡å±‚å¤„ç†é€»è¾‘ï¼Œé€»è¾‘å±‚å‘æŒä¹…å±‚å‘é€è¯·æ±‚ï¼ŒæŒä¹…å±‚ä¸æ•°æ®åº“äº¤äº’ï¼Œåå°†ç»“æœè¿”å›ç»™ä¸šåŠ¡å±‚ï¼Œä¸šåŠ¡å±‚å°†å¤„ç†é€»è¾‘å‘é€ç»™æ§åˆ¶å™¨ï¼Œæ§åˆ¶å™¨å†è°ƒç”¨è§†å›¾å±•ç°æ•°æ®ã€‚

äºŒã€SSMæ¡†æ¶çš„ç¯å¢ƒæ­å»ºã€‚

1.åˆ›å»ºåŠ¨æ€é¡¹ç›®

â€‚â€‚â€‚â€‚æˆ‘ä»¬å…ˆåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªåŠ¨æ€é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œåå­—éšæ„ï¼Œæˆ‘è¿™é‡Œå°±èµ·åâ€œSSMDemoâ€ã€‚æœåŠ¡å™¨æˆ‘é€‰æ‹©çš„æ˜¯Tomcat8.5+jdk1.8.module versionçš„ç‰ˆæœ¬æˆ‘é€‰æ‹©çš„æ˜¯3.1ï¼Œè¿™å¥—ç»„åˆæ¯”è¾ƒç¨³å®šã€‚

ç„¶åä¸€ç›´nextï¼Œä¹‹åæœ‰ä¸ªåˆ›å»ºweb.xmlçš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œæ‰“é’©ã€‚
ç„¶åé¡¹ç›®å°±åˆ›å»ºå®Œæˆäº†ã€‚å¦‚æœå¿˜è®°äº†æœ€åé‚£ä¸ªæ‰“é’©ç”Ÿæˆweb.xmlï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€‰æ‹©æ‰‹åŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªä¸œè¥¿åé¢ä¼šç”¨åˆ°ã€‚
ç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬å°±è¦å¼€å§‹é…ç½®SSMæ¡†æ¶äº†ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆæˆ‘ä»¬æŠŠjaråŒ…å¯¼è¿›æ¥ã€‚ç´ ææˆ‘ä¼šå‘åˆ°æˆ‘çš„å…¬ä¼—å·â€œå›è±ªè¯´ä»£ç â€ä¸­ï¼Œå›å¤â€œSSMjaråŒ…â€é¢†å–

2.é…ç½®web.xml

ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

<context-param>
	<param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
	<param-value>classpath:spring/applicationContext-*.xml</param-value>
</context-param>
<!-- é…ç½®ç›‘å¬å™¨åŠ è½½spring -->
<listener>
<listener-class>org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener</listener-class>
</listener>
<!-- å‰ç«¯æ§åˆ¶å™¨ -->
<servlet>
	<servlet-name>springmvc</servlet-name>
	<servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class>
	<init-param>
		<param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
		<param-value>classpath:spring/spring-mvc.xml</param-value>
	</init-param>
	<!-- åˆå§‹åŒ–å½“å‰servletçš„å¼€å…³ -->
	<load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
</servlet>
<servlet-mapping>
	<servlet-name>springmvc</servlet-name>
	<url-pattern>*.do</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>
<!-- è§£å†³ä¸­æ–‡ä¹±ç  -->
<filter>
	<filter-name>CharacterEncodingFilter</filter-name>
	<filter-class>org.springframework.web.filter.CharacterEncodingFilter</filter-class>
	<init-param>
		<param-name>encoding</param-name>
		<param-value>utf-8</param-value>
	</init-param>
	<init-param>
		<param-name>forceEncoding</param-name>
		<param-value>true</param-value>
	</init-param>
</filter>
<filter-mapping>
	<filter-name>CharacterEncodingFilter</filter-name>
	<url-pattern>/*</url-pattern>
</filter-mapping>

3.åˆ›å»ºä¸¤ä¸ªåŒ…

ç„¶ååœ¨srcä¸‹åˆ›å»ºä¸¤ä¸ªfolderï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯mybatis,ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯springã€‚

4.åˆ›å»ºSqlMapConfig.xml

åœ¨mybatisåŒ…ä¸‹åˆ›å»ºSqlMapConfig.xmlã€‚ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE configuration PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Config 3.0//EN" "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-config.dtd" >
<configuration>
<!-- è®¾ç½®å®ä½“ç±»çš„åˆ«å -->
<typeAliases>
<package name="com.mhys.crm.pojo"/>
</typeAliases>
</configuration>

5.åˆ›å»ºjdbc.properties

åœ¨springåŒ…ä¸‹é…ç½®jdbc.propertiesæ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥çš„é…ç½®ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œéœ€è¦ä½ æ”¹æˆä½ è‡ªå·±çš„æ•°æ®åº“å’Œå¯†ç 

jdbc.driver=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
jdbc.url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/crm?characterEncoding=utf-8
jdbc.username=root
jdbc.password=123456

6.åˆ›å»ºapplicationContext-dao.xml

åœ¨springåŒ…ä¸‹é…ç½®applicationContext-dao.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
xmlns:mvc="http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc"
xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans 
http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.2.xsd 
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context 
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context-4.2.xsd 
http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc 
http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc/spring-mvc-4.2.xsd ">
<!-- é…ç½®å¹¶è¯»å–properiesæ–‡ä»¶ -->
<context:property-placeholder
	location="classpath:jdbc.properies" />
<!-- é…ç½®æ•°æ®æº -->
<bean id="dataSource"
	class="com.alibaba.druid.pool.DruidDataSource">
	<property name="driverClassName" value="${jdbc.driver}"></property>
	<property name="url" value="${jdbc.url}"></property>
	<property name="username" value="${jdbc.username}"></property>
	<property name="password" value="${jdbc.password}"></property>
</bean>
<!-- é…ç½®SqlSessionFactory -->
<bean class="org.Mybatis.spring.SqlSessionFactoryBean">
	<!-- è®¾ç½®mybatisæ ¸å¿ƒé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ -->
	<property name="configLocation"
		value="classpath:mybatis/SqlMapConfig.xml"></property>
	<!-- è®¾ç½®æ•°æ®æº -->
	<property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"></property>
</bean>
<!-- é…ç½®Mapperæ‰«æ -->
<bean class="ory.Mybatis.spring.mapper.MapperScannerConfigurer">
	<!-- è®¾ç½®mapperæ‰«æåŒ… -->
	<property name="basePackage" value="com.mhys.crm.dao"></property>
</bean>
</beans>

7.åˆ›å»ºapplicationContext-service.xml

åœ¨springåŒ…ä¸‹é…ç½®applicationContext-service.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
xmlns:tx="http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx"
xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans 
http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.2.xsd 
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context 
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context-4.2.xsd 
http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx 
http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx/spring-tx-4.2.xsd 
http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop 
http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop-4.2.xsd ">
<!-- é…ç½®serviceå±‚æ‰«æ -->
<context:component-scan base-package="com.mhys.crm.service"></context:component-scan>
<!-- é…ç½®äº‹åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å™¨ -->
<bean id="transactionManager" class="org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DataSourceTransactionManager">
	<property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"></property>
</bean>
<!-- å¼€å¯æ³¨è§£æ–¹å¼ç®¡ç†aopäº‹åŠ¡ -->
<tx:annotation-driven transaction-manager="transactionManager"/>
</beans>

8.åˆ›å»ºspring-mvc.xml

åœ¨springåŒ…ä¸‹é…ç½®spring-mvc.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
xmlns:tx="http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx"
xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
xmlns:mvc="http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc"
xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.2.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context
http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context-4.2.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx
http://www.springframework.org/schema/tx/spring-tx-4.2.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc
http://www.springframework.org/schema/mvc/spring-mvc-4.2.xsd
http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop
http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop-4.2.xsd ">
<!-- é…ç½®Controllerå±‚æ‰«æåŒ… -->
<context:component-scan base-package="com.mhys.crm.controller"></context:component-scan>
<!-- é…ç½®æ³¨è§£é©±åŠ¨ -->
<mvc:annotation-driven></mvc:annotation-driven>
<!-- é…ç½®è§†å›¾è§£æå™¨ -->
<bean class="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.InternalResourceViewResolver">
	<property name="prefix" value="/jsp/"></property>
	<property name="suffix" value=".jsp"></property>
</bean>
</beans>

è‡³æ­¤SSMæ¡†æ¶ç¯å¢ƒå°±æ­å»ºå®Œæˆï¼Œå¯ä»¥å†™å…·ä½“çš„ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘äº†ã€‚
æ³¨ï¼šæˆ‘å†™çš„åŒ…åå’Œæ–‡ä»¶ååœ¨web.xmlä¸­éƒ½æœ‰é…ç½®ï¼Œå¦‚éœ€æ›´æ”¹åŒ…åè¯·è¿åŒweb.xmlé…ç½®ä¸€åŒä¿®æ”¹ï¼

entry.title: Hello Gridea
entry.content:
ğŸ‘ æ¬¢è¿ä½¿ç”¨ Gridea ï¼
âœï¸ Gridea ä¸€ä¸ªé™æ€åšå®¢å†™ä½œå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥ç”¨å®ƒæ¥è®°å½•ä½ çš„ç”Ÿæ´»ã€å¿ƒæƒ…ã€çŸ¥è¯†ã€ç¬”è®°ã€åˆ›æ„... ...

Github
Gridea ä¸»é¡µ
ç¤ºä¾‹ç½‘ç«™

ç‰¹æ€§ğŸ‘‡

ğŸ“ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨æœ€é…·çš„ Markdown è¯­æ³•ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œå¿«é€Ÿåˆ›ä½œ

ğŸŒ‰ ä½ å¯ä»¥ç»™æ–‡ç« é…ä¸Šç²¾ç¾çš„å°é¢å›¾å’Œåœ¨æ–‡ç« ä»»æ„ä½ç½®æ’å…¥å›¾ç‰‡

ğŸ’» ä½ å¯ä»¥åœ¨ Windowsï¼ŒMacOS æˆ– Linux è®¾å¤‡ä¸Šä½¿ç”¨æ­¤å®¢æˆ·ç«¯

ğŸŒ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ ğ–¦ğ—‚ğ—ğ—ğ—ğ–» ğ–¯ğ–ºğ—€ğ–¾ğ—Œ æˆ– Coding Pages å‘ä¸–ç•Œå±•ç¤ºï¼Œæœªæ¥å°†æ”¯æŒæ›´å¤šå¹³å°

ğŸ’¬ ä½ å¯ä»¥è¿›è¡Œç®€å•çš„é…ç½®ï¼Œæ¥å…¥ Gitalk æˆ– DisqusJS è¯„è®ºç³»ç»Ÿ

ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ä¸­æ–‡ç®€ä½“æˆ–è‹±è¯­

ğŸŒ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä»»æ„ä½¿ç”¨åº”ç”¨å†…é»˜è®¤ä¸»é¢˜æˆ–ä»»æ„ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹ä¸»é¢˜ï¼Œå¼ºå¤§çš„ä¸»é¢˜è‡ªå®šä¹‰èƒ½åŠ›

ğŸ–¥ ä½ å¯ä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰æºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨ OneDriveã€ç™¾åº¦ç½‘ç›˜ã€iCloudã€Dropbox ç­‰è¿›è¡Œå¤šè®¾å¤‡åŒæ­¥

ğŸŒ± å½“ç„¶ Gridea è¿˜å¾ˆå¹´è½»ï¼Œæœ‰å¾ˆå¤šä¸è¶³ï¼Œä½†è¯·ç›¸ä¿¡ï¼Œå®ƒä¼šä¸åœå‘å‰ ğŸƒ
